body: @edchengg Yes `model.forward()` sets it to training mode. However, the `generate_soft_embed` (`sample_soft_embed` in particular) is still run in eval mode. If you look at https://github.com/wiseodd/controlled-text-generation/blob/master/train_discriminator.py#L107-L121, `x_gen_attr` is from eval mode RNN and is used as G's loss. Hence backward fails.
